named-native-query.name: GetMessageList
named-native-query.query: SELECT m201.message_key ,m201.occur_date ,m201.occur_user_id ,m201.occur_user_name ,m201.origin_computer_name ,m201.message_no ,m201.resource_id ,m201.category ,m201.message_level ,m201.message_origin_source ,m201.db_area_div ,m201.message_param1 ,m201.message_param2 ,m201.message_param3 ,m201.message_param4 ,m201.message_param5 ,m201.message_param6 ,m201.message_param7 ,m201.message_param8 ,m201.message_param9 ,m201.message_param10 ,m201.occur_site_code ,m201.guidance_message ,m201.link_info ,m201.link_name FROM message m201 WHERE ('SEARCH_COND_START' <> 'SEARCH_COND_END') ORDER BY m201.occur_date DESC :p1 :p2 :p3 :p4 :p5

named-native-query.name: GetMessageOccurCnt
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) AS allCnt ,COUNT(CASE WHEN m201.category = :alert THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS alertCnt ,COUNT(CASE WHEN m201.category = :operation THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS operationGuideCnt FROM message m201 WHERE ('SEARCH_COND_START' <> 'SEARCH_COND_END') :p1 :p2 :p3 :p4

named-native-query.name: GetPopupMessageList
named-native-query.query: SELECT m201.occur_date ,m201.occur_user_id ,m201.occur_user_name ,m201.origin_computer_name ,m201.occur_site_code ,m201.message_no ,m201.resource_id ,m201.category ,m201.message_level ,m201.db_area_div ,m201.message_param1 ,m201.message_param2 ,m201.message_param3 ,m201.message_param4 ,m201.message_param5 ,m201.message_param6 ,m201.message_param7 ,m201.message_param8 ,m201.message_param9 ,m201.message_param10 ,m201.operation_type ,m201.message_code ,m201.message_key_name ,m201.message_origin_source ,m201.guidance_message ,m201.link_info ,m201.link_name FROM message m201, mstr_message_define m101 WHERE m201.message_no = m101.message_no AND m101.is_notice_push = :is_notice_push ORDER BY m201.occur_date DESC

named-native-query.name: GetMessageCnt
named-native-query.query: SELECT count(m201.message_key) as cnt FROM message m201 WHERE ('SEARCH_COND_START' <> 'SEARCH_COND_END') :p1 :p2 :p3 :p4 :p5

named-native-query.name: GetMessageWatcherSearchList
named-native-query.query: SELECT m201.message_no ,m201.category ,m201.watcher_search_key FROM message m201 WHERE (m201.watcher_search_key IS NOT NULL AND m201.watcher_search_key != '') AND :last_regist_datetime_from <= m201.last_regist_datetime AND :last_regist_datetime_to >= m201.last_regist_datetime

named-native-query.name: GetSendMailCount
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(message_key) cnt FROM message WHERE message_no = :message_no AND occur_date >= :occur_date

named-native-query.name: GetTmpQueueMailNoticeList
named-native-query.query: SELECT tmp_queue_mail_notice_key, message_key, occur_date, message_no, mail_notice_status, first_regist_event_id, first_regist_user_number, first_regist_user_name, first_regist_datetime, last_regist_event_id, last_regist_user_number, last_regist_user_name, last_regist_datetime, version FROM tmp_queue_mail_notice WHERE mail_notice_status = :mail_notice_status ORDER BY occur_date

named-native-query.name: JudgePersonLicenseCount
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT per_pos.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_position per_pos INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = pos_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id, pos_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_position per_pos INNER JOIN mstr_position_privilege pos_pri ON pos_pri.position_id = per_pos.position_id AND pos_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) UNION ALL SELECT per_rol.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_role per_rol INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = per_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_rol.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_rol.site_code = '-' OR per_rol.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_rol.order_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_rol.work_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_process_code = :work_process_code) UNION ALL SELECT per_pri.user_id, per_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_privilege per_pri WHERE per_pri.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pri.site_code = '-' OR per_pri.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pri.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pri.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pri.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pri.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND per_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id ) judge

named-native-query.name: JudgePersonLicenseCountAddWorkCell
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT per_pos.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_position per_pos INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = pos_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_pos.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id, pos_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_position per_pos INNER JOIN mstr_position_privilege pos_pri ON pos_pri.position_id = per_pos.position_id AND pos_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_pos.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) UNION ALL SELECT per_rol.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_role per_rol INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = per_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_rol.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_rol.site_code = '-' OR per_rol.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_rol.order_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_rol.work_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_rol.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) UNION ALL SELECT per_pri.user_id, per_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_privilege per_pri WHERE per_pri.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pri.site_code = '-' OR per_pri.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pri.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pri.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pri.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pri.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_pri.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_pri.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) AND per_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id ) judge

named-native-query.name: JudgePersonLicenseSubstituteCount
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT per_pos.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_pos.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_pos.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_pos.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = pos_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id, pos_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_pos.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_pos.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_pos.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_privilege pos_pri ON pos_pri.position_id = per_pos.position_id AND pos_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) UNION ALL SELECT per_rol.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_role per_rol ON per_rol.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_rol.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_rol.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_rol.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = per_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) UNION ALL SELECT per_pri.user_id, per_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_privilege per_pri ON per_pri.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_pri.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_pri.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_pri.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) AND per_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) ) judge

named-native-query.name: JudgePersonLicenseSubstituteCountAddWorkCell
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT per_pos.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_pos.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_pos.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_pos.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) AND per_pos.work_cell_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_cell_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = pos_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_sub.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id, pos_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_pos.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_pos.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_pos.work_cell_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_cell_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_privilege pos_pri ON pos_pri.position_id = per_pos.position_id AND pos_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_sub.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) UNION ALL SELECT per_rol.user_id, rol_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_role per_rol ON per_rol.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_rol.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_rol.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_rol.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) AND per_rol.work_cell_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_cell_code) INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = per_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_sub.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) UNION ALL SELECT per_pri.user_id, per_pri.privilege_id FROM mstr_person_substitute per_sub INNER JOIN mstr_person_privilege per_pri ON per_pri.user_id = per_sub.user_id AND per_pri.site_code IN ('-', per_sub.site_code) AND per_pri.order_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.order_process_code) AND per_pri.work_process_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_process_code) AND per_pri.work_cell_code IN ('-', per_sub.work_cell_code) AND per_pri.privilege_id = :privilege_id WHERE per_sub.substitute_user_id = :substitute_user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_sub.site_code = '-' OR per_sub.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_sub.order_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_sub.work_process_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_sub.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_sub.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) AND ('-' = :privilege_id OR per_sub.privilege_id = '-' OR per_sub.privilege_id = :privilege_id) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_from IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_from < :date_time) AND (per_sub.substitute_valid_to IS NULL OR per_sub.substitute_valid_to > :date_time) ) judge

named-native-query.name: JudgePersonLicenseDoubleCheckCount
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(1) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT per_pos.user_id FROM mstr_double_check dbl_chk INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND per_pos.position_id = dbl_chk.checker_position_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id FROM mstr_double_check dbl_chk INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id AND pos_rol.role_id = dbl_chk.checker_role_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' UNION ALL SELECT per_rol.user_id FROM mstr_double_check dbl_chk INNER JOIN mstr_person_role per_rol ON per_rol.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_rol.site_code = '-' OR per_rol.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_rol.order_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_rol.work_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND per_rol.role_id = dbl_chk.checker_role_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id FROM mstr_double_check dbl_chk INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = pos_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' UNION ALL SELECT per_pos.user_id FROM mstr_double_check dbl_chk INNER JOIN mstr_person_position per_pos ON per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_position_privilege pos_pri ON pos_pri.position_id = per_pos.position_id AND pos_pri.privilege_id = dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' UNION ALL SELECT per_rol.user_id FROM mstr_double_check dbl_chk INNER JOIN mstr_person_role per_rol ON per_rol.user_id = :user_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_rol.site_code = '-' OR per_rol.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_rol.order_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_rol.work_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_process_code = :work_process_code) INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = per_rol.role_id AND rol_pri.privilege_id = dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' UNION ALL SELECT per_pri.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND per_pri.privilege_id = dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id WHERE dbl_chk.privilege_id = :privilege_id AND dbl_chk.checker_position_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_role_id <> '' AND dbl_chk.checker_privilege_id <> '' ) judge

named-native-query.name: UpdatePrintoutStatusTimeoutError
named-native-query.query: UPDATE history_printout SET printout_status = :printout_status, printout_error_message = :printout_error_message, last_regist_event_id = :last_regist_event_id, last_regist_user_number = :last_regist_user_number, last_regist_user_name = :last_regist_user_name, last_regist_datetime = :last_regist_datetime, version = :version WHERE printout_status = :printout_status_processing AND first_regist_datetime <= :first_regist_datetime

named-native-query.name: GetScreenEnableButtonList
named-native-query.query: SELECT button_id as buttonId FROM ( SELECT scr_but.button_id FROM mstr_person_position per_pos INNER JOIN mstr_position_role pos_rol ON pos_rol.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = pos_rol.role_id INNER JOIN mstr_screen_button scr_but ON rol_pri.privilege_id = scr_but.privilege_id WHERE per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND scr_but.screen_id = :screen_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_pos.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) UNION ALL SELECT scr_but.button_id FROM mstr_person_position per_pos INNER JOIN mstr_position_privilege pos_pri ON pos_pri.position_id = per_pos.position_id INNER JOIN mstr_screen_button scr_but ON pos_pri.privilege_id = scr_but.privilege_id WHERE per_pos.user_id = :user_id AND scr_but.screen_id = :screen_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pos.site_code = '-' OR per_pos.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pos.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pos.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_pos.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_pos.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) UNION ALL SELECT scr_but.button_id FROM mstr_person_role per_rol INNER JOIN mstr_role_privilege rol_pri ON rol_pri.role_id = per_rol.role_id INNER JOIN mstr_screen_button scr_but ON rol_pri.privilege_id = scr_but.privilege_id WHERE per_rol.user_id = :user_id AND scr_but.screen_id = :screen_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_rol.site_code = '-' OR per_rol.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_rol.order_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_rol.work_process_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_rol.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_rol.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) UNION ALL SELECT scr_but.button_id FROM mstr_person_privilege per_pri INNER JOIN mstr_screen_button scr_but ON per_pri.privilege_id = scr_but.privilege_id WHERE per_pri.user_id = :user_id AND scr_but.screen_id = :screen_id AND ('-' = :site_code OR per_pri.site_code = '-' OR per_pri.site_code = :site_code) AND ('-' = :order_process_code OR per_pri.order_process_code = '-' OR per_pri.order_process_code = :order_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_process_code OR per_pri.work_process_code = '-' OR per_pri.work_process_code = :work_process_code) AND ('-' = :work_cell_code OR per_pri.work_cell_code = '-' OR per_pri.work_cell_code = :work_cell_code) ) judge
